name: Invisible Inc. (Weekly Game Jam 147)
description:
Weekly Game Jam 147 Invisible

Need to have agents page and missions page open at the same time to work correctly.

Manage your spy agency.  Make sure you  don't run out of money.

Keyboard and Mouse controls:

A = Toggle Agents Page

I = Toggle Missions Page

R= Restart Game

Mouse Scroll = select mission

Up and Down arrows = select agent

Left mouse button to initiate button currently hovered over. 

Game Rules:

-Spy = 250 Gold

-Worker = 100 Gold

-Sell a spy for half price

-The more workers you have the faster you get missions.

-If HP gets to 0 or below your spy dies.

-Salary of agents is deducted from your gold every 1 minute.

NOTES:

*Didn't have time to add sound effects, final touches, or a menu.

focused on learning how to use and create data grids and inventory type mechanics.  Really fun project though!!
